column4: Is there a way to create a virtual dev on my linux box that is bound with an internal IP address, and create a virtual device that is bound with an external IP address. Meaning have raw data comming to a local ip address of my machine, but my machine will see that is data comming in on virtual_dev_input and then I have a virtual_dev_output that a program sends info to which is actually sending it to an external ip address
google that, not sure exactly what you are trying to do, almost counds like you are asking about ipf except for this virtual device stuff...
